	- marketingPecentage = _feeMarketing.mul(10000).mul(10 ** 9).div(_feeMarketing.add(_feeTeam)) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/84/849ba2278cdae7fa7006c0661fea1c35d5af3336_TheCitadel.sol#279)
